markdown: ###### Major Positive reputation gained with Children of the Dawnstars and the Gullet | rewardname2 = Sell the medicine to Pitli | reward2 = [Halgot's Warmth](/halgotsWarmth/);{{cp2|200}};Minor Positive reputation gained with Children of the Dawnstars;Major Positive reputation gained with The Gullet. | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = | conc = | internalname = 06_QST_Cold_Hard_Hope | guid = 0c97f630-fe71-4c02-8810-5ec5351ab608 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [side quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsSideQuests/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Several Roparu in the Gullet have fallen ill with drowner's lung, a deadly and contagious disease. Pitli, a priestess from the Children of the Dawnstars, is caring for them in secret and needs medicine. ## Walkthrough * [Pitli](/pitli/) believes that Delver's Row can provide the necessary medicine. She doesn't know how to get there, but thinks that people who hang out at the local tavern might. * You can talk to Overseer Hitengo about this and the sick will be taken away and likely die. *Speak to [Fyrna](/fyrna/) at [The Hole](/theHole/) regarding the location of [Delver's Row](/delversRow/) (or see [The Narrows](/theNarrows/) for details), and then make your way there. * Once in Delver's Row, talk to [Ernezzo](/ernezzo/) in his shop to the northwest of the area. You can either pay {{cp2|800}} for the medicine, or do a little favor for him - kill [The Spindle Man](/theSpindleMan/). ** Talking to [The Spindle Man](/theSpindleMan/) will reveal a hidden entrance to the storeroom if you reveal Ernezzo's plans towards him. He will ask that you kill Ernezzo instead. In exchange, The Spindle Man promises to give you better prices (a 10% discount) at his store. ** You can also hire [Rust](/rust/) to assassinate either Ernezzo (for {{cp2|300}}) or The Spindle Man (for {{cp2|600}} - due to the additional guards). Rust will take a day to get the job done. You can also ask him about the cure to drowner's lung, he'll think you're diseased and point you towards [Ernezzo](/ernezzo/). ** Alternatively, you can sneak into the side room and steal the medicine yourself. ** Another option is just to kill Enezzo for the medicine. His gang leave the shop at night to drink, meaning less enemies to deal with. * Either way, once you've retrieved the [Drowner's Lung Medicine](/drownersLungMedicine/), return to [Pitli](/pitli/). You can demand payment or just give it to her for a warm fuzzy feeling and [Halgot's Warmth](/halgotsWarmth/), a unique ring. * Once you leave Pitli's Sanctuary, you will be contacted by a [Cloaked Messenger](/cloakedMessenger/) who will invite you to meet [Dereo the Lean](/dereoTheLean/) at [his lair](/dereosLair/) in [The Narrows](/theNarrows/). This is one of [multiple ways](/dereosLair/) you can gain access to the lair. ## Notes * After accepting the offer to kill [the Spindle Man](/theSpindleMan/) and informing him of the request of [Ernezzo](/ernezzo/) to have him killed. He will ask you to kill [Ernezzo](/ernezzo/) instead though most likely turning the whole [Delver's Row](/delversRow/) against you, using a [Delayed Fireball](/delayedFireball/) then closing the door can accomplish the task without angering anyone but his guards who can't see you. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/06_Neketaka_Slums_District/06_QST_Cold_Hard_Hope.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Harsh Medicine''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Several Roparu in the Gullet have fallen ill with drowner's lung, a deadly and contagious disease. Pitli, a priestess from the Children of the Dawnstars, is caring for them in secret and needs medicine. |- | rowspan="3" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Go to Delver's Row in the Gullet.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Pitli thinks I could find the medicine she needs on Delver's Row. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | Pitli doesn't know how to reach Delver's Row, but the people that hang around the tavern might. |- | rowspan="11" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Find drowner's lung medicine on Delver's Row.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Delver's Row is bustling with shops and suspicious characters. One of them is bound to have the medicine Pitli needs. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20009 | Ernezzo is rumored to have the medicine. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20002 | Ernezzo promised to give me the medicine if I kill the Spindle Man, another Delver's Row merchant. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20003 | Some of Ernezzo's gang leave his shop at night to go drink. It will be lightly guarded then. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20005 | The Spindle Man proposed that I kill Ernezzo instead. It promised me lower prices in return. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20004 | The Spindle Man mentioned a secret entrance to Ernezzo's storeroom. I can sneak in from the wooden catwalk east of his shop. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20010 | The Spindle Man is no more. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20011 | Rust will eliminate Ernezzo for me. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20012 | I've hired Rust to kill the Spindle Man. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20013 | Ernezzo is dead. |- | rowspan="4" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Give the drowner's lung medicine to Pitli in her home in the Gullet.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | I have the medicine Pitli needs. Pitli and her charges were banished to the Old City. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | I gave the medicine to Pitli.
